The judge’s keen eye for sussing out the pretension of the lawyers in her courtroom was surpassed only by the _________ wit with which she castigated them for it.
A.	sedulous
B.	mordant
C.	obtuse
D.	jurisprudent
E.	trenchant
F.	assiduous
